description: You can find (a/an) recliner which is square. Square is one of a few possible shapes (a/an) recliner usually has. There is only a limited range of possible shapes.
You can find (a/an) recliner which is square. Square is one of many possible shapes (a/an) recliner usually has. The range of shapes is almost unlimited.
comment-piek: "Square can be global shape but in fact they have complex shapes

description: I could say (a/an) recliner is square, but I would most certainly not mean it literally.
comment-pia: "square in the sense of conservative, old-fashioned, small-minded
comment-piek: "There is no figurative meaning but I would call them square

description: Usually, (a/an) recliner is not square, but there could be a highly unusual situation in which (a/an) recliner is square.
comment-piek: "They are squarish but have complex shapes

description: Usually, (a/an) leopard is not yellow, but there could be a highly unusual situation in which (a/an) leopard is yellow.

description: I know that (a/an) pen is round as most or all other things similar to (a/an) pen are round.
comment-piek: "There is no category of round things and pens would not belong to it if there would be such a category

description: ``Round'' is one for the first things which come to mind when I hear ``pen' because round is one of the typical shapes of (a/an) pen'.
comment-piek: "One dimension is never round but the other is usually round

description: I know that being round is necessary for many things (a/an) pen does or is used for.
comment-pia: "I think the cylindric (i.e. round-ish) shape is nice for holding a pen in your hand.
comment-piek: "roundness is not essential, you could have square pens in the same dimension. Note that pen can also stand for an area to keep animals
